label: geNomad end-to-end
description: Currently Executes all modules of the geNomad pipeline for plasmid and virus identification from FASTA formatted contigs

parameters.label: Input FASTA file
parameters.desc: Input file of contigs in FASTA format containing sequences to analyze

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written

parameters.label: Output File Name
parameters.desc: File to which the output will be written

parameters.label: Filtering preset
parameters.desc: Conservative preset makes filters more aggressive for high-confidence results, relaxed preset disables post-classification filters

parameters.label: Lenient taxonomy
parameters.desc: Allow classification of virus genomes to taxa below the family rank

parameters.label: Full ICTV lineage
parameters.desc: Output the full ICTV lineage of each virus genome

parameters.label: Force automatic composition
parameters.desc: Force automatic composition estimation regardless of sample size
